ygData.subject: Patch Results
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I played a little last night in Seb and really love the new Charm s duration. Gives you a lot more time to help bring down the first mob. Two more things
ygData.messageBody:
Well I played a little last night in Seb and really love the new Charm's
duration. Gives you a lot more time to help bring down the first mob.

Two more things worth mentioning:

1) Is Mez (Pixie) sticking more for anyone else? It's sticking (just
guessing) about 50%+ for me instead of 25-33% w/ CHA at 103. I didn't time
the duration (prob the same) but just seemed a lot more effective than
pre-patch for me.

2) Stacking problems. I haven't tried a lot of combinations, but can
confirm that SOS and Niv's don't stack anymore. I could have sworn that
that they did pre-patch, so I think this is a buffing nerf. Could someone
else confirm this?

Thanks,
Tzeetch on Xegony
